name: Hole Flounder
description:
You play as Travis the fish (with legs) on his journey into the depths. Use gems you find to buy items and suit upgrades from a magical frog wizard to fall deeper. 

Controls:

Use WASD - Move.
Space - use a Time Charge.
No exit button right now, Alt+Tab to get out.
